attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in our prime minister during this Coronavirus outbreak
attributes.additional_details: Take power away from Boris Johnson and give it to a party that will do the right thing by its people and stop this madness before it gets any worse
attributes.background: We as a people have no confidence in our government they refuse to shut schools during this outbreak putting more lives at risk there has already been 35 deaths and rising

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers, including the Prime Minister, to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

We used to accept petitions that called for a vote of no confidence. However, the Petitions Committee can’t schedule votes of no confidence. This was often frustrating and disappointing for petitioners.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
